Lyric:
[00:10.79]Do you recall, not long ago 
[00:13.34]We would walk on the sidewalk 
[00:15.85]Innocent, remember? 
[00:18.33]All we did was care for each other 
[00:21.18]But the night was warm 
[00:22.63]We were bold and young 
[00:25.75]All around the wind blows 
[00:28.31]We would only hold on to let go 
[00:30.56]Blow a kiss, fire a gun 
[00:32.81]We need someone to lean on 
[00:35.47]Blow a kiss, fire a gun 
[00:37.64]All we need is somebody to lean on 
[00:40.33]Blow a kiss, fire a gun 
[00:42.51]We need someone to lean on 
[00:45.23]Blow a kiss, fire a gun 
[00:47.55]All we need is somebody to lean on 
[01:09.67]What will we do when we get old? 
[01:12.10]Will we walk down the same road? 
[01:14.62]Will you be there by my side? 
[01:16.96]Standing strong as the waves roll over 
[01:20.68]When the nights are long 
[01:22.04]Longing for you to come home 
[01:24.50]All around the wind blows 
[01:26.61]We would only hold on to let go 
[01:29.28]Blow a kiss, fire a gun 
[01:31.52]We need someone to lean on 
[01:34.12]Blow a kiss, fire a gun 
[01:36.48]All we need is somebody to lean on 
[01:39.14]Blow a kiss, fire a gun 
[01:41.35]We need someone to lean on 
[01:44.13]Blow a kiss, fire a gun 
[01:46.69]All we need is somebody to lean on 
[01:56.52]All we need is somebody to lean on 
[02:06.22]All we need is somebody to lean on 
[02:07.99]Lean on, lean on, lean on, lean on... 
[02:33.65]Blow a kiss, fire a gun 
[02:35.42]We need someone to lean on 
[02:37.69]Blow a kiss, fire a gun 
[02:40.12]All we need is somebody to lean on 
[02:42.77]Blow a kiss, fire a gun 
[02:45.17]We need someone to lean on 
[02:47.76]Blow a kiss, fire a gun 
[02:49.94]All we need is somebody to lean on
